title: Ed Miliband – 2012 One Nation Speech in Cardiff
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Ed Miliband, the Leader of the Opposition, in Cardiff on 11th October 2012.
content:
[![edmiliband](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/edmiliband-214x300.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/edmiliband.jpg)
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
  *[ABI]: Association of British Insurers
  *[CMU]: Capital Markets Union
  *[IMO]: International Maritime Organization
  *[MARPOL]: International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships.

After three weeks of the party conferences, one thing is clear. Labour has defined the central question for the next election: who can make us One Nation?
